amendatorysection.catchline: Effect of filing of dissolving statement.
amendatorysection.para: Upon the filing by the Secretary of State of a statement of intent to dissolve, the limited liability company shall cease to carry on its business except as may be necessary for the winding up of its business. The separate existence of the limited liability company shall continue until a certificate of dissolution has been issued by the Secretary of State or until a decree dissolving the limited liability company has been entered by a court of competent jurisdiction.
